main.name: Rexel Bryan Collado
main.bio: Hi! I'm Rexel Bryan A. Collado, a self-taught Web Developer based in Davao City,Philippines. I am self-motivated, always willing to improve overtime and push myself to the boundaries in any way possible. I keep myself up to date with recent technologies so i can grow an extensive skillset in different areas.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

work.title: Tech Support
work.description: Assisted with any technical issues and provided with other various tasks. Handled hardware troubleshooting of IT equipments in an enterprise environment. Tracked and documented IT equipment issues.

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone
projects.category: WhatsApp Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.category: Amazon Clone built with Firebase, ExpressJS, and ReactJS

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
